title: Pizzo del Ramulazz
text:
Pizzo del Ramulazz is a 2,939 metres high <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, located on the border between the cantons of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a> and <a href="Graub%C3%BCnden">Graubünden</a>. The east side of the mountain, overlooking the <a href="Calanca">Calanca</a> valley, consists of a large and steep face.
A secondary summit (2,915 metres) on the north side overlooks Passo del Ramulazz.
